attachBehavior ( $  name,
$  behavior 
) [inherited]

Attaches a behavior to this component.

Calls the Yii implementation of this method, then injects the behaviors methods into our class.

Parameters:
string $name The behavior's name. It should uniquely identify this behavior.
mixed $behavior the behavior configuration. This is passed as the first parameter to YiiBase::createComponent to create the behavior object.
Returns:
IBehavior the behavior object

Detaches a behavior from the component.

The behavior's IBehavior::detach method will be invoked.

Parameters:

Returns:

Definition at line 85 of file CXLComponent.php.

static hash ( $  hashTarget = null,
$  hashType = self::SHA1,
$  hashLength = 32,
$  rawOutput = false 
) [static]

Generic hashing method.

Will hash any string or generate a random hash and hash that!

Parameters:
string $hashTarget The value to hash..
integer $hashType [optional] The type of hash to create. Can be {
See also:
CXLHash::MD5}, {
CXLHash::SHA1}, or CXLHash#CRC32. Defaults to {
CXLHash::SHA1}.
Parameters:
integer $hashLength [optional] The length of the hash to return. Only applies if $hashType is not MD5, SH1, or CRC32. . Defaults to 32.
boolean $rawOutput [optional] If $rawOutput is true, then the hash digest is returned in raw binary format instead of ASCII.
Returns:
string
